title: Shattered Relics League/Tasks

properties.name: description
properties.value: This page contains a list of all of the tasks in the Shattered Relics League. Completing tasks during the league allows players to earn League Points and Sage's Renown which allow players to unlock Skills and Bosses, auto-complete quests, and unlock Fragment slots.

content:
Shattered Relics League
Guide

This page contains a list of all of the tasks in the Shattered Relics League. Completing tasks during the league allows players to earn League Points and Sage's Renown which allow players to unlock Skills and Bosses, auto-complete quests, and unlock Fragment slots.

Tier Total tasks League Points each Total League Points Sage's Renown each Total Sage's Renown
Beginner 61 5 305 1 61
Easy 158 5 790 1 158
Medium 314 25 7,850 2 628
Hard 330 50 16,500 3 990
Elite 336 125 42,000 4 1,344
Master 61 250 15,250 5 305
Total 1260 N/A 82,695 N/A 3,486
Tasks by type
Attack Hitpoints Mining
Strength Agility Smithing
Defence Herblore Fishing
Ranged Thieving Cooking
Prayer Crafting Firemaking
Magic Fletching Woodcutting
Runecraft Slayer Farming
Construction Hunter Combat
Quests Clues General

{{Shattered Relics League Guide Nav}} This page contains a list of all of the tasks in the [[Shattered Relics League]]. Completing tasks during the league allows players to earn [[League Points]] and [[Sage's Renown]] which allow players to unlock [[Skills]] and [[Bosses]], auto-complete [[quests]], and unlock
